title: PayPal on How To Prepare APIs for Agentic AI Future
author: Loraine Lawson
description: PayPal predicts a significant shift to AI agent-led shopping within five years. At Post/Con, the company shared how to write APIs for AI.
cntitle: PayPal 如何为 Agentic AI 的未来准备 API
cndescription: PayPal 预测未来五年内，AI 代理主导的购物方式将发生重大转变。在 Post/Con 大会上，该公司分享了如何为 AI 编写 API。
